price: Sε ͻsoro mu dwidwa a afei εbεyε kͻͻ tesε aboa nwoma (a yɛahyε no) kͻͻ.
arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ وَرۡدَةٗ كَٱلدِّهَانِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā inshaqqati al-samāu fakānat wardatan kal-dihāni
